mapper.insert: insert into IQ_APPLICATION_RETURN_COLUMN (PK_ID, APP_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, STATS, LABEL, SEQ, LENGTH,NOTE) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IQ_APPLICATION_RETURN_COLUMN set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATS = #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, APP_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, STATS, LABEL, SEQ, LENGTH,NOTE from IQ_APPLICATION_RETURN_COLUMN
